loops-code-question7_key2: Now, we will make a game using loops. We will call this game a guessing game.
loops-code-question7_key3: In this game we take any number, let us suppose this number is number 5.
loops-code-question7_key4: After this we take any number as an input from the user between 1 to 10. The user tries to guess this number.
loops-code-question7_key5: Suppose the user gives 3as an input. We will then check if 3 is equal to 5 or not?
loops-code-question7_key6: 3 is not equal to 5 so we will ask the user for another input.
loops-code-question7_key7: Now, we will check if that number is equal to 5 or not.
loops-code-question7_key8: User will get 5 chances to guess.
loops-code-question7_key9: If he guessed right within the 5 chances he wins and if he guesses wrong then loses the game.
loops-code-question7_key11: Study about break statement in python.
